Posts.EditableText:
I am currently using Linux, so I am using the Web based version of Quest. I am using Midori Web Browser which works great. I noticed on the Quest Web version that there is no Clear Picture Frame option under scripts. I know for sure it is in the windows desktop version. Am I just missing this option somewhere or has it not been implemented into the web based version? When is the next update for the Web based version?

Thank You
InsertCoin25
